features: 3-in-1 car seat grows with your child from rear-facing harness (5-40 lb) to forward-facing harness (22-65 lb) to highback booster (40-100 lb)
Graco ProtectPlus Engineered: a combination of the most rigorous crash tests that helps to protect your little one in frontal, side, rear & rollover crashes
No-Rethread Simply Safe Adjust Harness System allows the headrest and harness to adjust together in one motion
Choose the perfect headrest height from 10 positions to get the safest fit for your child as they grow

body.description: The Graco Landmark 3-in-1 Car Seat grows with your child. It’s three seats in one, for comfort at every stage. This 3-in-1 car seat converts from rear-facing harness (5-40 lb) to forward-facing harness (22-65 lb) to highback booster (40-100 lb). Thanks to the no-rethread Simply Safe Adjust Harness System, the harness and headrest adjust together in one motion, to ensure that your child is always properly secured. The 4-position recline keeps your child comfortable, while the InRight LATCH system makes installation easy with a one-second attachment. The seat is Graco ProtectPlus Engineered to help protect your little one in frontal, side, rear, and rollover crashes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Graco Landmark 3-in-1 Car Seat The Graco Landmark 3-in-1 Car Seat grows with your child. It’s three seats in one, for comfort at every stage! It’s a rear-facing harnessed car seat (5-40 lb), a forward-facing harnessed car seat (22-65 lb), and a belt-positioning booster (40-100 lb). The perfect car seat for: Families searching for one car seat to use from baby to big kid Children 5-40 lb (rear-facing harness mode) Children 22-65 lb (forward-facing harness mode) Children 40-100 lb (belt-positioning booster mode)
3 Seats in 1 Rear-Facing Harness For children 5-40 lb Forward-Facing Harness For children 22-65 lb Belt-Positioning Booster For big kids 40-100 lb

More Features to Love No-Rethread Harness With the Simply Safe Adjust Harness System, the headrest and harness adjust in one motion with one hand, ensuring your child is always properly secured. Recline for Comfort 4-position recline helps keep your growing child comfy on your many journeys together. Easy-Clean, Washable Seat Cover Washable seat cover is easy to access without removing the harness, so it's simple to keep clean. Integrated Harness Storage Storage compartment holds unused harness straps while in the belt-positioning booster mode.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Great car seat! The cover comes off on sections and is easy to take off and button or clip back on for cleaning. If there's only a mess on some of the car seat you don't have to take the whole thing off so that's def a plus! Easy to install. Cup holder can go on either side and my 2 year old can reach it. Everything is easy to adjust regarding seatbelts, buckle straps, and height adjustment. I really have nothing negative to say about it and I've had it for a good 3 months, using it rear facing and forward facing. Which I should add that I loved how I could keep my 2 year old rear facing as long as I did. It definitely put me at ease. You'd think that their legs wouldn't have room and that you'd have to put them forward facing, but after doing research on it I found out that they'll just figure out a way to make themselves comfortable (which is easy in this spacious seat). It's still safer having them rear facing as long as they meet the seat requirements!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great seat, rear facing is a pain.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this seat for our growing grandson. Initially installed it rear facing. The adjustment strap however was impassible to get to. This was totally unlike the dedicated rear facing seat we bought of the same brand. Forward facing it is still difficult, but manageable. If the adjustment was more user friendly, it would be perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe and cool
reviews.reviewText: EDITED! The car seat is comfortable and safe for my little Bud. One challenge is that it doesn’t level properly without a towel under it in my Audi Q7. (The directions suggest to use a towel...) So it wasn’t as easy to install as the Chicco base, and I really wish I’d gone with another Chicco, but this will do especially because of the cost of buying two. I do really like the ease of raising the headrest and subsequently the harness straps (no refeeding through awkward tiny slots). There is a challenge in my husbands truck. The mechanism for loosening the harness is near impossible to get to because of the angle of the backseats and the placement of the button. Bud feels cool in his car seat and that’s important. NEW INFO: we have since added twins to our family, and this seat has now gone front facing. Still love it. It fits well with two Chiccos next to it. I have no idea how it will all fit once the babies outgrow their infant carriers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Car seat review
reviews.reviewText: I love this car seat so much, I bought three. The value and the price are perfectly matched. Both daughters-in-law loved them as well. They were easy to install and arrived on time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: I originally got two of these on prime day for my children’s grandparents. I have had other Graco’s in the past and know they are reliable. This definitely isn’t as easy to put in as other car seats we have, it takes some real strength to tighten the strap for the latch hooks when installing which is frustrating. It is a bit bigger than I was expecting, but otherwise its comfortable for my 9 month old who sits rear facing and I know they are safe which is all that matters!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality and Safety Features
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, but heavy. Excellent quality! Purchased it on Prime Day for 40% off!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We needed a second seat for the less used car to save keep swapping the existing seat between them. This was good value and prior reviews rated it highly - I agree. Easy to fit and secure properly and given the color selected blends in suitably with the car. Daughter is very happy sitting in this particular seat for 1-1.5hr trips. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it a great product
